name: Faith Eternal
effect: Revives a character and restores 10% of Max HP, then restores an additional 150 HP.
description: Kujou Sara's specialty. Forget calling it a dish, this is really more like a snack. The sweet, fluffy flavor really doesn't seem to suit Sara's own preferences. Wait a moment. That symbol on the snack â€” does this have to do with a certain other person's tastes instead?
